page.title: 06THORNBURY FESTIVALS / SUMMER
page.content:
{THE CARNIVAL } Every year we have a carnival in Thornbury. First of all there is a procession of floats and people in fancy dress through the main streets of the town. The carnival itself is held at Mundy Playing Fields and there are lots of games to play and sweets and things to buy. There are also entertainments, usually of displays and people doing stunts. This year there was a free-fall parachute jump. Sarah Price (Aged 10 Yrs)
{THORNBURY CHURCH TOWER OPEN DAY} One Saturday in July the church tower is open to the public.{ { {THORNBURY FLOWER FESTIVAL} In August the Armstrong Hall and the local churches are decorated as part of the flower festival.
